doc.title: Malek wa ketaba
doc.plot: One face of Dr. Mahmoud is a classical acting teacher who have just gone through a crisis after discovering his wife's sleeping with a teen ager. One Face of Hend who attends one of his acting classes one day that ended dramatically in clash with him; is practical, liberal & energetic, She moved from Alexandria to Cairo trying to start a career accepting any kind of work in the business. One Face of Tarek her boyfriend is a really talented photographer who's too artistic for the kind of commercial work he is offered and too lazy to try anything else, taking Hend for granted, and false comfort of smoking Hash. The Three cross path and are shaken up through life unexpected turns that shows another face of each one of them.
